snippet: As part of a regular segment on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” in which celebrities read mean Twitter posts that people have written about them, Mr. Obama read a few unkind Tweets about himself.
abstract: As part of a regular segment on “Jimmy Kimmel Live” in which celebrities read mean Twitter posts that people have written about them, Mr. Obama read a few unkind Tweets about himself.

headline.main: Obama Reads Mean Tweets About Himself
